Title:
Hypotrachyna isidiociliata, a new species in the subgenus
Parmelinopsis (Parmeliaceae) from Brazil
Keywords: Lichens, Cerrado, Taxonomy, Phylogeny, nuITS, mtSSU
Abstract:
This study describes a new species of Hypotrachyna
subgenus Parmelinopsis from southeastern Cerrado (Brazilian savanna), a
biodiversity hotspot. Especially common in open vegetation areas,
including urban environments, Hypotrachyna isidiociliata sp. nov. is
morphologically and chemically similar to H. horrescens. Nevertheless,
phylogenetic analyses of the nuITS and mtSSU regions revealed that H.
isidiociliata is a distinct species and closely related to the North
American H. mcmulliniana, differing by the size of its laciniae and
ascospores.
